overview: Chaos happened at one of the tour bus terminals. When Khom, a tour driver is chasing passionately with a beautiful bus hostess while getting into a needle, accidentally glances at the body of a young woman who was killed in the car. Both of them hurried to tell Jay Duong tour bus owner Fearing that the matter would affect the bus business, the three teamed up to carry out a funeral camouflage plan with the intention of discarding the bodies along the way.
title: Sam Yan
